messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] t-shirt orders
messages.msgSnippet: Sunday, I ll ask when I talk with Alice at the printers. ~K Kelly Lovejoy Conference Coordinator Live and Learn Unschooling Conference October 6-9, 2005
messages.messageBody:
Sunday, I'll ask when I talk with Alice at the printers.

~K

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org

-----Original Message-----
From: Sunday Cote <sundaycote@...>


Hi Everyone,

I was going to e-mail Kelly off-list, but then thought maybe someone
else would know this.

I wasn't sure on the sizes for my kids. I can't remember what I finally
ordered but I have a 3 year old who normally wears 4 T and a seven year
old who wears 7/8. I couldn't tell by the sizes listed if they run
large or small. I'm not good with knowing sizes, I usually just eye it.
If you've had experience with these shirts in the past, maybe you could
make a recommendation. Or if someone else in the group who has kids my
age could give a suggestion that would be great. My boys would be
bummed if the shirts were too small!

Thanks,
Sunday

I was going to e-mail Kelly off-list, but then thought maybe someone

I wasn't sure on the sizes for my kids. I can't remember what I finally

old who wears 7/8. I couldn't tell by the sizes listed if they run

If you've had experience with these shirts in the past, maybe you could

-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
kbcdlovejo@...
Sent: Thursday, August 11, 2005 7:09 AM
To: LiveandLearnConference@yahoogroups.com;
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com; UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] t-shirt orders

I need to place to t-shirt order BEFORE the end of this month in order
to have them in time for the conference.

If you're not ready to register yet but think you'd like a t-shirt or
two, please order at least the t-shirt!!!

I will be ordering a *few* extra, but don't plan on buying one at the
conference. You *might* luck out, but I wouldn't hold my breath! They
really need to be pre-ordered!

Thanks for making my day/life easier! <g>

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org
